com.github.macgregor.alexandria.flexmark

Class AlexandriaFlexmark

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.flexmark.AlexandriaFlexmark
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context.ContextAware

    public class AlexandriaFlexmark
extends Object
implements Context.ContextAware
    Configure Flexmark markdown library, registering optional Extensions to customize rendering and parsing of HTML.

    • Method Detail

      • registerExtension

        public void registerExtension(com.vladsch.flexmark.Extension extension)
        Register a Flexmark Extension to customize HTML rendering or parsing. Extensions must be registered before the global HtmlRenderer and Parser are instantiated by calling parser() or renderer()
        Parameters:
        extension - the Extension to register

      • registeredExtensions

        public Set<com.vladsch.flexmark.Extension> registeredExtensions()
        Return the registered extensions, creating the underlying list and adding DEFAULT_EXTENSIONS as needed.
        Returns:
        initialized set of extensions that will be added to the Parser and HtmlRenderer

      • options

        public com.vladsch.flexmark.util.options.MutableDataSet options()
        Configure common Flexmark options to be used by both the Parser and HtmlRenderer instances.
        Returns:
        flexmark options
